# Pentourminous

This is a [Pentominous](https://puzz.link/rules.html?pentominous) with the additional constraint that each loop must travel over pentomino shapes in a repeating cycle - that is, if the loop goes over an A followed by a B, it must later go over at least one more A followed by a B (with nothing in between the A and B). Each cycle must have at least two different shapes, must repeat at least twice, and the cycle can not have repeated pentomino shapes - e.g. ABAB is fine, ABABAB is fine, ABCABC is fine, ABCBABCB is NOT fine, ABCAB is NOT fine.  
**NOTE** This puzzle is fairly bashy.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2022/pentourminous1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
